# Author : Harshit Garg
# Day Of Week Calcualtor

t = int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
	q, m, Y = map(int, raw_input().split(' '))
	
	if m == 1:
		m = 13
		Y = Y - 1
	elif m == 2:
		m = 14	
		Y = Y - 1
	
	h = (q + int((m+1)*26/10) + Y + int(Y/4) + 6*(Y/100) + int(Y/400))
	d = (h+5)%7+1
	#print q,m,Y, d
	if d == 1:
		print "Monday"
	elif d == 2:
		print "Tuesday"
	elif d == 3:
		print "Wednesday"	
	elif d == 4:
		print "Thrusday"
	elif d == 5:
		print "Friday"
	elif d == 6:
		print "Saturday"
	elif d == 7:
		print "Sunday"
